title: Refactor connection importers to work with the credential manager
author: sparerd
body_snippet: When importing connections from another format, credentials should be harvested and provided to the user just like the confCons upgrade process. Currently, they attempt to save the user/domain/password data directly to the connection record.

iterations.description: Refactoring importers to use the credential manager improves security and maintainability by centralizing secret handling.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): Refactoring importers to use the credential manager improves security and maintainability by centralizing secret handling.
Approach: Modify connection importer classes to route imported credentials through the CredentialManager service rather than assigning them directly to connection properties.
